alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Houston; Pulaski; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Dodge, northern Pulaski, southern Twiggs, Bleckley and southeastern Houston Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Empire to Paulk to Browndale, and moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Hawkinsville, Warner Robins, Hayneville, Browndale, Tarversville, Empire, Houston Lake, Mobley Crossing, Roddy, Baileys Park, Royal, District Path, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Paulk, Cary, Pulaski State Prison, Porter, Kathleen and Coley Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
